title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 200.7 - Maintenance of equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 200.7 - Maintenance of equipment

State Regulations

Any person who owns or operates an air contamination source
which is equipped with an emission control device shall operate such device and
keep it in a satisfactory state of maintenance and repair in accordance with
ordinary and necessary practices, standards and procedures, inclusive of
manufacturer's specifications, required to operate such device
effectively. Notes

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
